headline: May PPI, Adobe Q2 earnings, jobless claims: What to Watch
summary: Market Domination Overtime hosts Julie Hyman and Josh Lipton preview the top market stories and headlines Wall Street will be paying attention to tomorrow, Thursday, June 12, including May's Producer Price Index (PPI) print, corporate earnings from Adobe (ADBE) and RH (RH), and this week's latest data on initial jobless claims. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime here.

headline: Here's Where Traders Expect Adobe Stock To Go After Earnings

headline: Jim Cramer Says Adobe Stock “Might Be Worth It but It Would Be a Flyer”
summary: Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ:ADBE) is one of the 11 stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar. Cramer recommended buying Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ:ADBE) shares for “under 20 times earnings”. “Adobe reports after the close, and it looks like the stock could break that downtrend it’s been experiencing for some time. I wish the competition weren’t so fierce here, but […]

headline: UBS Lifts PT on Adobe Inc. (ADBE) to $430, Maintains Neutral Rating
summary: Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ:ADBE) is one of the best wide moat stocks to buy now. On June 9, UBS analyst Karl Keirstead reiterated a Neutral rating on ADBE and lifted the target price to $430 from $380. The analyst is looking forward to Adobe’s Q2 earnings report, which is set to be published on June 12, […]
